column4: Hello! I can't receive nor send any message from ubuntu. I can telnet localhost 25 but the problem is it won't send any mail to yahoo.com.
do you run a firewall?
m using the routers firewall..
where will i do that? in ssh console?
what do you think is the problem?
DNS resolution is working
type this into your browser
m working from a remote.. I can only access the box thru ssh
so...how's it? can you help me with it?
how did you try to access www.yahoo.com then?
thru putty
via X11forwarding right?
I know how to ping.. if I will ping 209.131.36.158 it will respond.. no timed out... I don't use GUI
ah
really?
m sure it doesn't block port 80. I have PCs in the LAN and I can browse wherever I like. and I have already the website up...so...how could the router block port 80 then?
any update?
it doesn't block. I can access the webpages of my website hosted there..
here in our place..our ISP doesn't block any port.. I just asked them
the thing is you can resolve the DNS name, a DNS name is like www.google.com
thats the problem actually.. the box will tell me everytime I restart the apache and it can't find reliable DNS....something like that..
okay...I will update you about the router's settings... a minute..
